commentBody:
Misleading sttement:
"Accompanied by rock stars, ex-presidents, old friends and their grown children, the Democratic and Republican nominees pleaded with voters to end a traumatic campaign..."

As far as I know the Republican nominee did not have "rock stars, ex-presidents, old friends" accompanying him. Only the Democratic nominee did. No respectable person wanted to be seen in the company of Trump while he was campaigning.

replies.commentBody: He  even  made a nasty  speech  about  this!  How  SHE had all the stars--from  JLo  to Beyonce  and beyond--and there HE was  allllllll alooooone--in  his misery.  It  was  almost  pitiful.  Except  for that  certain  delish  quality  of--Too effen'  BAD  you  orange  clown.  Maybe  if  you had tried to act REMOTELY  HUMAN--someone-ANYONE-would have WANTED  to  be  out  there with  you.  Even  the daughter  you  most  want to  sleep  with abandoned  you  at  the end.    Maybe  Putin  still loves  you==but--somehow-=-I  doubt  it.
